text: "Helena" is the third single of American rock band, My Chemical Romance's second album, Three Cheers for Sweet Revenge. Helena was released on March 8th, 2005. It is a tribute to Gerard Way and Mikey Way's late grandmother, Elena. It went to number 20 in the United States, number 27 in New Zealand and number 33 in the United States. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2005 songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Gothic rock songs Category:Punk rock songs Category:My Chemical Romance songs
title: Helena (song)
